title: create cache wen connected to db
author: febelus
body_snippet:
if you connect to db there are no way to open in local without connection.
is necessary that if connected to db and no connetion to it the data must be opened in read only with cache.

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: in coming version it will be a bit different. We should have profile, that accept inputs from several sources. Some sources can be read only, some writable. So play scenario in yours case. You have empty profile. You make a connection to db, and ask to import connection data. You will be asked if you wish to store that data locally or not (in advance you may select store passwords or not) that will be encrypted and stored locally, or it will be flashed out once you close session (or application)...
